content.question: In Il-Khanid courtly culture, the figure of Bahram Gur from the Bahram Gur Fights the Karg folio in the Great Il-Khanid Shahnama would have symbolized

choices.label: the rebirth or reincarnation of a soul after death
loyalty to those who reign with divine approval
civilized rule overcoming turmoil or disarray
the importance of spirituality over material wealth

content.answer: civilized rule overcoming turmoil or disarray

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.2: Purpose and Audience in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
